name: 25 Button Hover Animations
description:
Figma is a powerful prototyping tool and there is a simple, yet effective way to bring your designs to life - button hover animations.


Inside the file, you will find 25 unique animated buttons with an option to change the style from fill to outline or use one of the radius presets.


Overall it’s 100 variants and just one button instance to rule them all!


Don't forget to show some love ❤️ and duplicate the file.


We're available for new projects! Drop us a line at ux@netguru.com.
